p: The aforementioned simulators are mostly general purpose simulators and are not specifically designed for epidemiology. However, our objective is to minimize learning curves for both developers and users, maximize portability, include intuitive interfaces for modeling, and seamlessly incorporate epidemiological analysis tools. Furthermore, the simulators had some disadvantages (Rao et al. 2009). Consequently, we endeavored to develop SEARUMS, a custom Eco-modeling and HITL bio-simulation environment.
